Jiajia is a bioinformatician at BDSI and RSB, providing technical support for HDR students and researchers across the school. She received a Master of Data Science from the University of Canberra in 2021, and a Bachelor of Engineering from the Henan University in 2019. Jiajia has experience in single cell RNA-seq and image denoising. Her current goal is to help lift up the overall programming skills for RSB students and researchers.
